name: Science Pack
white_cards: Being knowledgeable in a narrow domain that nobody understands or cares about.
Driving into a tornado to learn about tornadoes.
Fun and interesting facts about rocks.
Getting really worried about global warming for a few seconds.
Oxytocin release via manual stimulation of the nipples.
Reconciling quantum theory with general relativity.
The quiet majesty of the sea turtle.

black_cards.text: A study published in Nature this week found that _____ is good for you in small doses.
Hey there, Young Scientists! Put on your labcoats and strap on your safety goggles, because today we're learning about _____!
In an attempt to recreate conditions just after the Big Bang, physicists at the LHC are observing collisions between _____ and _____.
In line with our predictions, we find a robust correlation between _____ and _____ (p<.05).
In what's being hailed as a major breakthrough, scientists have synthesized _____ in the lab.
Today on Mythbusters, we found out how long _____ can withstand _____.
